Merge pull request #26 from CJKu/dup_texture

Bug 1133007 - (LayerScope) Prevent sending duplicate texture image

Bug 1133007 - (LayerScope) Prevent sending duplicate texture image

If the content data of a texture node is null, that means the content is
already in image pool. In this case, the viewer should relink a new TextureNode
with the image content in the image pool.

Bug 1163908 - [LayerScope] Add Heat map in viewer

Bug 1163908 - [LayerScope] Add Heat map in viewer

1. Correct z-index of setting dialog

Merge pull request #19 from CJKu/heat-map

Bug 1163895 - Move protocal buffer parsing from main thread to worker thread

Move protocal buffer parsing from main thread to worker thread

LayerScope becomes sluggish while connecting with a profile target. That's
because the main thread is heavily parsing protocol buffer pacakages from
WebSocket. Move data parsing from main thread to a dedicated worker to fix this
symptom.

Fix UI bugs

1. Clear property table after clicking on an invisible node.
2. Skip property table redaw if selecting the same tree node.

Implement zoom function

1. Add tool-bar in texture-pane for containing frame-slider and zoom buttons
2. Implement zoom function: includes zoom-in/zoom-out/1:1.
3. Move frame-slider into tool-bar.
4. Rename TexturePool to ImageDataPool: since this object literally contains
ImageData, instead of Texture.

Remove duplicate texture checking.

Since it causes a bug when texture are really duplcated.

Change layerscope to full-window mode

Scollbar disapear. So that we have more space for texture display.

Adjust UI

1. Left/ Right data panel pixl alignment.
2. Remove usless css rules.
3. Enlarge dragable hit zone.

Bug 1130766 - Reduce the size of saved file

1. TexturePool: contructs a global texture pool to prevent duplcate textures.
2. ZIP: uses JSZip for saving/load scoped data.
3. Progressbar: show a progressbar to reveal saving/loading status.

Fix UI type

Correct "URL" to "URL"

Merge pull request #12 from CJKu/ui-rework

UI rework

Bug 1125782 - Enrich layer tree presentation

1. Integrate DataTable jquery-ui-plug-in
2. Integrate Jstree jquery-ui-plug-in
3. Integrate jquery-ui-resizable
4. Refurbish command buttons, such as connect/ load/ save, by bootstrap css
5. Add setting button

Bug 1123537 - Add event listener for connection close

We should update the status on the viewer after the
websocket server crashes or closes the connection.

Bug 1121804 - Support bi-directional message sending

1. Support websocket messages sending from clients to servers
2. Add two checkbox to enable/disable LayerTree/LayerBuffer
3. Handle synchornizaion of statuses between clients and servers

Add QUnit testing framework

1. Add QUnit testing framework
2. Add basic QUnit testing cases

Bug 1124588 - Viewer refactory

1. Remove all global variables.
2. Session: for session control and render graph building.
3. RenderNode: host render filters
4. DataProcessNode: host data processing filters.
5. TreeRenderer/ LayerBufferRenderer: display layer tree and buffer on the page.
6. ProtoDataProcesser: convert proto buffer into frame objects.
7. ConnectionManager: create websocket connection
Remove test folder. I will re-update test platform and test cases in another check-in

Bug 1079755 - Add a new meta packet to handle other meta data

In this patch, add the composition type in meta packet to nofity users
whether this frame is composed by Hardware composer.
ignore *.swp
add the first test case - test_parseURL
Change protobuffer js path in layerviewer.js
Create lib folder and move js libraries into
add testing framework

Bug 960380 - Support saving/loading data

1. Save layer data into a JSON file, and you can load files from a JSON file.
2. Support saving/loading frames for layerscope addon

Fix the representation of MaskLayer addresses

The type of MakeLayer address is uint64, so we fix the representation
and only display the low 32 bits.

Bug 1073103 - Rename Thebeslayer to PaintedLayer

We substitutes Thebeslayer with PaintedLayer on mozilla-central,
so does Layerscope.

Bug 959118 - Dump layer tree

Reconstuct the layer tree by the layer list and highlight the specific
layer image.

Bug 959118 - Support LayerDump packet

Decode layerdump packet from gecko. However, we still need to
reconstruct the layer tree.

Bug 1035045 - Import google protocol buffer

Use google protocol buffer and add comments for each function.

Create README.md

Create README.md and add the Mozilla wiki link.
add support for color layers
initial LayerScope 2020 commit
